traits.name: Ghastly Visions
entries: Each creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the dream eater must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} of the dream eater until the start of the creature's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to this dream eater's Ghastly Visions trait for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The dream eater can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dream eater has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dream eater makes two Ensnaring Shriek attacks.

actions.name: Ensnaring Shriek
entries: {@atk ms,rs} +8 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) psychic damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the dream eater.
